title: Old icon to new icon
body: Is there a way to change the logo on the desktop from the old one from ages ago to the new clients logo. I have updated to the newer client so it should have updated already right? I still have to click launch to get to the log in screen. Any help is appreciated. :)

replies.body: I just reinstalled League, allowed to fully patch, and have tried repair and am having this exact issue even though I was fully updated before.
